title: Brass Hand Spinner Fidget Spinner EDC Toy Metal Spinning Tops Gyro, Premium Bearing, Ultra Duarable
feature: Spin Times: 6-9min, Premium Bearing for extremely fast and long spin times. Removerable Buttons: Easy take off caps make cleaning and replacing bearings conveniently. (Besides, if you want to get a fidget spinner which can spin more than 9min, please contact us.)

Material: Brass body. Balance Wheel x 2, Ruby x 4, Sapphire x 12. The balance wheel on each side can move. When you spin the spinner, the fly wheels spin together. Very special and beautiful. Limited edition designed, very worthy of collection.
Helpfully: Great For Anxiety, Focusing, ADHD, Autism, Quitting Bad Habits, Helps Relieve Stress,Staying Awake,also effective for Focus and Deep Thought through the Different Play.

How to Use: Hold spinner in one hand and use the other hand to spin it rapidly using small continuous strikes to keep it spinning indefinitely with practice,spinners can be spun using one hand only using the fingers of one hand to stop and start spinning.
